QuestData.Title: A Grim Harvest
QuestData.Description: The spores grow thick further into the marsh, but those larger fungus beasts are the key.$b$bYes, kill them and take their spore sacs. I will need them to refine my... search.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Khaano $1oa Spore Pods from the Fungal Stompers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those pods are critical $p, I need them!
QuestData.RewardText: I... I must consume these like the mushrooms. It will help me locate the source, I swear!
